dock_01.title: The Rust Dock
text: Cold steel. Old salt. A lantern swings with a tired rhythm.
A narrow gangway leads inland. A crate sits half-open.

choices.label: Walk the gangway toward the city lights
Search the half-open crate
choices.log: You find a small tin key wrapped in oilcloth.

choices.label: Open the locked maintenance hatch
choices.lockText: The hatch will not budge. You need a key.

street_01.title: Quayside Street
text: Footsteps fade into fog. A sign reads: NORTH MARKET, SOUTH YARD.
A watchman leans against a post, pretending not to watch you.

choices.label: Ask the watchman about the hatch
choices.log: He mutters: 'Old tunnels. Bad air. If you go, go prepared.'

hatch_01.title: Maintenance Tunnel
text: The air tastes like pennies. Water drips in the dark.
A faint draft comes from deeper in.

choices.label: Go deeper into the tunnel
choices.lockText: You hesitate. You do not know what you are stepping into.

tunnel_02.title: The Draft
text: The tunnel opens into a bricked archway with a carved emblem.
A switch box sits beside the arch, marked POWER.

choices.label: Flip the power switch
choices.log: A low hum begins. Somewhere above, lights wake up.

choices.label: Enter the archway
choices.lockText: The archway stays sealed. It needs power.

vault_01.title: The Quiet Vault
text: A room of old machines. A terminal blinks: ACCESS GRANTED.
You feel like the city just became larger than you thought.

choices.label: Take the terminal printout
choices.log: The printout lists district names you have never heard.

market_01.title: North Market
text: Canvas awnings. Hot tea. Quiet deals.
A vendor offers a small lamp that smells of fresh oil.

choices.label: Buy the oil lamp (trade the tin key)
choices.log: You trade the key for an oil lamp. The vendor will not meet your eyes.

yard_01.title: South Yard
text: Broken crates and chain. A dog barks at shadows.
You spot a narrow path behind stacked pallets.

yard_02.title: Hidden Cutthrough
text: A cramped lane. Someone painted a symbol that matches the tunnel emblem.
This city has more than one way in.

market_001.title: Market Lane 1
text: Canvas awnings ripple in the wind.
Voices barter in low tones, then vanish.
Warm steam rises from a kettle cart.

choices.label: Find your way back to the main stall row

market_002.title: Market Lane 2
text: Canvas awnings ripple in the wind.
Voices barter in low tones, then vanish.
Someone chalked a symbol on a post.

market_003.title: Market Lane 3
text: Canvas awnings ripple in the wind.
Voices barter in low tones, then vanish.
A stray cat watches your hands.

choices.label: Follow the dim service corridor
choices.lockText: The route stays shut without power.

market_004.title: Market Lane 4
